title: Phasmophobia helper
banshee_description: A Banshee is a natural hunter and will attack anything. It has been known to stalk it’s prey one at a time until making it’s kill.
banshee_strongSide: A Banshee will only target one person at a time.
banshee_weakSide: Banshees fear the Crucifix Cross and will be less aggressive when near one.
demon_description: A Demon is one of the worst Ghosts you can encounter. It has been known to attack without a reason.
demon_strongSide: Demons will attack more often than any other Ghost.
demon_weakSide: Asking a Demon successful questions on the Ouija Board won’t lower the users sanity.
